collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (4 total Queries, 4 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `a`.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.id) as category_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.name) AS category_names FROM `fileuploads` `a` LEFT JOIN `file_categories` `ac` ON `a`.`id` = `ac`.`fileuploads_id` LEFT JOIN `categories` `c` ON `ac`.`category_id` = `c`.`id` WHERE `a`.`type` = 'public' AND `a`.`status` = 'published' GROUP BY `a`.`id` ORDER BY `a`.`created_at` DESC

SELECT `a`.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.id) as category_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.name) AS category_names FROM `articles` `a` LEFT JOIN `article_categories` `ac` ON `a`.`id` = `ac`.`article_id` LEFT JOIN `categories` `c` ON `ac`.`category_id` = `c`.`id` WHERE `a`.`type` = 'public' AND `a`.`status` = 'published' GROUP BY `a`.`id` ORDER BY `a`.`created_at` DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `a`.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.id) as category_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.name) AS category_names FROM `fileuploads` `a` LEFT JOIN `file_categories` `ac` ON `a`.`id` = `ac`.`fileuploads_id` LEFT JOIN `categories` `c` ON `ac`.`category_id` = `c`.`id` WHERE `a`.`type` = 'public' AND `a`.`status` = 'published' GROUP BY `a`.`id` ORDER BY `a`.`created_at` DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `a`.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.id) as category_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.name) AS category_names FROM `articles` `a` LEFT JOIN `article_categories` `ac` ON `a`.`id` = `ac`.`article_id` LEFT JOIN `categories` `c` ON `ac`.`category_id` = `c`.`id` WHERE `a`.`type` = 'public' AND `a`.`status` = 'published' GROUP BY `a`.`id` ORDER BY `a`.`created_at` DESC
